original_text: Terrors shall make him afraid on every side, and shall drive him to his feet.
korean_text: 무서운 것이 사방에서 그를 놀라게 하고 그 뒤를 쫓아갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: Terrors shall make him afraid on every side
sentences.korean_translation: 두려움이 그를 사방에서 무섭게 할 것이며

sentences.original_text: and shall drive him to his feet
